document.full_text: it may be weeks before the escaped cobra from new york's bronx zoo is found, but the highly poisonous snake has seized the pop-culture moment with a fake twitter account of her sightseeing adventures around manhattan.
document.title: alleged escapades of bronx zoo's missing cobra posted on twitter
lines_and_colors: it may be weeks before the escaped cobra from new york's bronx zoo is found, but the highly poisonous snake has seized the pop-culture moment with a fake twitter account of her sightseeing adventures around manhattan.
